h4.p: [03]^b^1-10^eb^^b^.^eb^ Ekādasakanipātassa ^a^V3.0333^ea^^a^M3.0357^ea^ paṭhamādīni uttānatthāneva. Dasame ^b^janitasmi^eb^nti kammakilesehi nibbatte, jane etasminti vā ^b^janetasmiṃ,^eb^ manussesūti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ye gottapaṭisārino’’^eb^ti. Janitasmiṃ-saddo eva vā i-kārassa e-kāraṃ katvā ‘‘janetasmi’’nti vutto. ^b^Janitasmi^eb^nti ca janasminti attho veditabbo. Janitasminti sāmaññaggahaṇepi yattha catuvaṇṇasamaññā, tattheva manussaloke. ^b^Khattiyo seṭṭho^eb^ti ayaṃ lokasamaññāpi manussalokeyeva, na devakāye brahmakāye vāti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘ye gottapaṭisārino’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Paṭisarantī^eb^ti ‘‘ahaṃ gotamo, ahaṃ kassapo’’ti paṭi paṭi attano gottaṃ anussaranti paṭijānanti vāti attho.
[06]Kimatthiyasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Nissayavaggavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^11-14^eb^^b^.^eb^ Dutiyassa ^a^V3.0334^ea^ paṭhamādīni uttānatthāni. Tatiye ^b^kabaḷīkārāhārabhakkhāna^eb^nti kabaḷīkārāhārūpajīvīnaṃ. Ko pana devānaṃ āhāro, kā āhāravelāti? Sabbesampi kāmāvacaradevānaṃ sudhā āhāro. Sā heṭṭhimehi heṭṭhimehi uparimānaṃ uparimānaṃ paṇītatamā hoti, taṃ yathāsakaṃ divasavaseneva divase divase bhuñjanti. Keci pana ‘‘biḷārapadappamāṇaṃ sudhāhāraṃ bhuñjanti, so jivhāya ṭhapitamatto yāva kesagganakhaggā kāyaṃ pharati, tesaṃyeva divasavasena ^a^M3.0358^ea^ satta divase yāpanasamattho hotī’’ti vadanti. ^b^Asamayavimuttiyā vimutto^eb^ti maggavimokkhena vimutto. Aṭṭhannañhi samāpattīnaṃ samāpajjanassa samayopi atthi tassa asamayopi, maggavimokkhena pana vimuccanassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthi. Yassa saddhā balavatī, vipassanā ca āraddhā, tassa gacchantassa tiṭṭhantassa nisīdantassa nipajjantassa khādantassa bhuñjantassa ca maggaphalappaṭivedho nāma na hotīti na vattabbaṃ. Iti maggavimokkhena vimuccantassa samayo vā asamayo vā natthīti maggavimokkho asamayavimutti nāma. Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ.
[06]Paṭhamamahānāmasuttādivaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^15^eb^^b^.^eb^ Pañcame ^b^sesajanā^eb^ti mettāya cetovimuttiyā alābhino. ^b^Samparivattamānā^eb^ti dakkhiṇeneva passena asayitvā sabbaso parivattamānā. ^b^Kākacchamānā^eb^ti ghurughurupassāsavasena vissaraṃ karontā. ^b^Sukhaṃ supatī^eb^ti ettha duvidhā supanā sayane piṭṭhippasāraṇalakkhaṇā kiriyāmayacittehi avokiṇṇabhavaṅgappavattilakkhaṇā ca. Tatthāyaṃ ubhayatthāpi sukhameva supati. Yasmā saṇikaṃ nipajjitvā aṅgapaccaṅgāni samodhāya pāsādikena ākārena sayati, niddokkamanepi jhānaṃ samāpanno viya hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘evaṃ asupitvā’’^eb^tiādi.

[03]Niddākāle sukhaṃ alabhitvā dukkhena suttattā eva paṭibujjhanakāle sarīrakhedena nitthunanaṃ ^a^V3.0335^ea^ vijambhanaṃ ito cito ca viparivattanañca hotīti āha ^b^‘‘nitthunantā vijambhantā samparivattantā dukkhaṃ paṭibujjhantī’’^eb^ti. Ayaṃ pana sukhena suttattā sarīrakhedābhāvato nitthunanādivirahitova paṭibujjhati. Tena vuttaṃ ^b^‘‘evaṃ appaṭibujjhitvā’’^eb^tiādi. Sukhappaṭibodho ca sarīravikārābhāvenāti āha ^b^‘‘sukhaṃ nibbikāra’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Bhaddakameva supinaṃ passatī^eb^ti idaṃ anubhūtapubbavasena devatūpasaṃhāravasena cassa bhaddakameva supinaṃ hoti, na pāpakanti katvā vuttaṃ. Tenāha ^b^‘‘cetiyaṃ vandanto viyā’’^eb^tiādi. Dhātukkhobhahetukampi cassa bahulaṃ bhaddakameva siyā yebhuyyena cittajarūpānuguṇatāya utuāhārajarūpānaṃ.

[03]^b^Ure^eb^^a^M3.0359^ea^^b^āmukkamuttāhāro viyā^eb^ti gīvāya bandhitvā ure lambitamuttāhāro viyāti kehici taṃ ekāvalivasena vuttaṃ siyā, anekaratanāvalisamūhabhūto pana muttāhāro aṃsappadesato paṭṭhāya yāva kaṭippadesassa heṭṭhābhāgā palambanto ure āmukkoyeva nāma hoti.

[03]^b^Visākhatthero viyā^eb^ti (visuddhi. 1.258) so kira pāṭaliputte kuṭumbiyo ahosi. So tattheva vasamāno assosi ‘‘tambapaṇṇidīpo kira cetiyamālālaṅkato kāsāvapajjoto, icchiticchitaṭṭhāneyevettha sakkā nisīdituṃ vā nipajjituṃ vā, utusappāyaṃ senāsanasappāyaṃ puggalasappāyaṃ dhammassavanasappāyanti sabbamettha sulabha’’nti. So attano bhogakkhandhaṃ puttadārassa niyyātetvā dussante baddhena ekakahāpaṇeneva gharā nikkhamitvā samuddatīre nāvaṃ udikkhamāno ekaṃ māsaṃ vasi. So vohārakusalatāya imasmiṃ ṭhāne bhaṇḍaṃ kiṇitvā asukasmiṃ vikkiṇanto dhammikāya vaṇijjāya tenevantaramāsena sahassaṃ abhisaṃhari. Iti anupubbena mahāvihāraṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ yācati. So pabbājanatthāya sīmaṃ nīto taṃ sahassatthavikaṃ ovaṭṭikantarena bhūmiyaṃ pātesi. ‘‘Kimeta’’nti ca vutte ‘‘kahāpaṇasahassaṃ, bhante’’ti vatvā, ‘‘upāsaka, pabbajitakālato paṭṭhāya na sakkā vicāretuṃ, idāneva naṃ vicārehī’’ti vutte ‘‘visākhassa pabbajjaṭṭhānaṃ āgatā mā rittahatthā gamiṃsū’’ti muñcitvā sīmāmāḷake vikkiritvā pabbajitvā upasampanno. So pañcavasso hutvā dvemātikā paguṇā katvā attano sappāyaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekekasmiṃ vihāre cattāro cattāro māse samapavattavāsaṃ vasamāno cari. Evaṃ caramāno –
[21]‘‘Vanantare ^a^V3.0336^ea^ ṭhito thero, visākho gajjamānako;
[22]Attano guṇamesanto, imamatthaṃ abhāsatha.
[21]‘‘Yāvatā upasampanno, yāvatā idha māgato;
[22]Etthantare khalitaṃ natthi, aho lābho te mārisā’’ti. (visuddhi. 1.258);

[03]So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gacchanto dvedhāpathaṃ patvā ‘‘ayaṃ nu kho maggo, udāhu aya’’nti cintayanto aṭṭhāsi. Athassa pabbate adhivatthā devatā ^a^M3.0360^ea^ hatthaṃ pasāretvā ‘‘eso maggo’’ti dasseti. So cittalapabbatavihāraṃ gantvā tattha cattāro māse vasitvā ‘‘paccūse gamissāmī’’ti cintetvā nipajji. Caṅkamasīse maṇilarukkhe adhivatthā devatā sopānaphalake nisīditvā parodi. Thero ‘‘ko eso’’ti āha. Ahaṃ, bhante, maṇiliyāti. Kissa rodasīti? Tumhākaṃ gamanaṃ paṭiccāti. Mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ ko guṇoti? Tumhesu, bhante, idha vasantesu amanussā aññamaññaṃ mettaṃ paṭilabhanti, te dāni tumhesu gatesu kalahaṃ karissanti, duṭṭhullampi kathayissantīti. Thero ‘‘sace mayi idha vasante tumhākaṃ phāsuvihāro hoti, sundara’’nti vatvā aññepi cattāro māse tattheva vasitvā puna tatheva gamanacittaṃ uppādesi. Devatāpi puna tatheva parodi. Eteneva upāyena thero tattheva vasitvā tattheva parinibbāyīti. Evaṃ dhamattāvihārī bhikkhu amanussānaṃ piyo hoti.

[03]^b^Balavapiyacittatāyā^eb^ti iminā balavapiyacittatāmattenapi satthaṃ na kamati, pageva mettāya cetovimuttiyāti dasseti. ^b^Khippameva cittaṃ samādhiyati,^eb^ kenaci paripanthena parihīnajjhānassa byāpādassa dūrasamussāritabhāvato khippameva samādhiyati, ‘‘āsavānaṃ khayāyā’’ti keci. Sesaṃ suviññeyyameva. Ettha ca kiñcāpi ito aññakammaṭṭhānavasena adhigatajjhānānampi sukhasupanādayo ānisaṃsā labbhanti. Yathāha –
[21]‘‘Sukhaṃ supanti munayo, ajjhattaṃ susamāhitā;
[22]Suppabuddhaṃ pabujjhanti, sadā gotamasāvakā’’ti. (visuddhi. mahāṭī. 1.258); Ca ādi –

[07]Tathāpime ānisaṃsā brahmavihāralābhino anavasesā labbhanti byāpādādīnaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvato brahmavihārānaṃ. Tenevāha ‘‘nissaraṇaṃ hetaṃ, āvuso, byāpādassa, yadidaṃ mettācetovimuttī’’tiādi ^a^V3.0337^ea^ (dī. ni. 3.326; a. ni. 6.13). Byāpādādivasena ca sattānaṃ dukkhasupanādayoti tappaṭipakkhabhūtesu brahmavihāresu siddhesu sukhasupanādayo hatthagatā eva hontīti.
[06]Mettāsuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^16^eb^^b^.^eb^ Chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0361^ea^^b^beluvagāmake^eb^ti vesāliyā dakkhiṇapasse avidūre beluvagāmako nāma atthi, taṃ gocaragāmaṃ katvāti attho. ^b^Sārappattakulagaṇanāyā^eb^ti mahāsāramahappattakulagaṇanāya. ^b^Dasame ṭhāne^eb^ti aññe aññeti dasagaṇanaṭṭhāne. Aṭṭhakanagare jāto bhavoti ^b^aṭṭhakanāgaro. Kukkuṭārāmo^eb^ti pāṭaliputte kukkuṭārāmo, na kosambiyaṃ.

[03]Pakatatthappaṭiniddeso ta-saddoti tassa ‘‘bhagavatā’’tiādīhi padehi samānādhikaraṇabhāvena vuttassa yena abhisambuddhabhāvena bhagavā pakato adhigato supākaṭo ca, taṃ abhisambuddhabhāvaṃ saddhiṃ āgamanīyapaṭipadāya atthabhāveneva dassento ^b^‘‘yo so…pe… abhisambuddho’’^eb^ti āha. Satipi ñāṇadassanasaddānaṃ idha paññāvevacanabhāve tena tena visesena nesaṃ visayavisese pavattidassanatthaṃ asādhāraṇañāṇavisesavasena, vijjāttayavasena, vijjābhiññānāvaraṇavasena, sabbaññutaññāṇamaṃsacakkhuvasena paṭivedhadesanāñāṇavasena ca tadatthaṃ yojetvā dassento ^b^‘‘tesaṃ tesa’’^eb^ntiādimāha. Tattha ^b^āsayānusayaṃ jānatā^eb^ āsayānusayañāṇena, ^b^sabbañeyyadhammaṃ passatā^eb^ sabbaññutānāvaraṇañāṇehi. ^b^Pubbenivāsādīhī^eb^ti pubbenivāsāsavakkhayañāṇehi. ^b^Paṭivedhapaññāyā^eb^ti ariyamaggapaññāya. ^b^Desanāpaññāya passatā^eb^ti desetabbadhammānaṃ desetabbappakāraṃ bodhaneyyapuggalānañca āsayānusayacaritādhimuttiādibhedaṃ dhammaṃ desanāpaññāya yāthāvato passatā. ^b^Arīna^eb^nti kilesārīnaṃ, pañcavidhamārānaṃ vā sāsanassa vā paccatthikānaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ. Tesaṃ pana hananaṃ pāṭihāriyehi abhibhavanaṃ appaṭibhānatākaraṇaṃ ajjhupekkhaṇañca. Kesivinayasuttañcettha nidassanaṃ. Tathā ṭhānāṭṭhānādīni ^b^jānatā^eb^. Yathākammūpage satte ^b^passatā^eb^. Savāsanānamāsavānaṃ khīṇattā ^b^arahatā^eb^. Abhiññeyyādibhede dhamme abhiññeyyādito aviparītāvabodhato ^b^sammāsambuddhena^eb^.

[03]Atha vā tīsu kālesu appaṭihatañāṇatāya ^b^jānatā^eb^. Kāyakammādivasena tiṇṇampi kammānaṃ ^a^V3.0338^ea^ ñāṇānuparivattito nisammakāritāya ^b^passatā^eb^. Davādīnampi abhāvasādhikāya pahānasampadāya ^b^arahatā^eb^. Chandādīnaṃ ^a^M3.0362^ea^ ahānihetubhūtāya akkhayapaṭibhānasādhikāya sabbaññutāya ^b^sammāsambuddhenā^eb^ti evaṃ dasabalaaṭṭhārasaāveṇikabuddhadhammavasenapi yojanā kātabbā.

[03]^b^Abhisaṅkhata^eb^nti attano paccayehi abhisammukhabhāvena samecca sambhuyya kataṃ. Svāssa katabhāvo uppādanena veditabbo, na uppannassa paṭisaṅkharaṇenāti āha ^b^‘‘uppādita’’^eb^nti. Te cassa paccayā cetanāpadhānāti dassetuṃ pāḷiyaṃ ‘‘abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayita’’nti vuttanti ^b^‘‘cetayitaṃ kappayita’’^eb^nti atthamāha. ^b^Abhisaṅkhataṃ abhisañcetayita^eb^nti ca jhānassa pātubhāvadassanamukhena viddhaṃsanabhāvaṃ ulliṅgeti. Yañhi ahutvā sambhavati, taṃ hutvā paṭiveti. Tenāha pāḷiyaṃ ^b^‘‘yaṃ kho panā’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Samathavipassanādhamme ṭhito^eb^ti ettha samathadhamme ṭhitattā samāhito vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā aniccānupassanādīhi niccasaññādayo pajahanto anukkamena taṃ anulomañāṇaṃ pāpetā hutvā vipassannādhamme ṭhito. Samathavipassanāsaṅkhātesu dhammesu rañjanaṭṭhena ^b^rāgo^eb^. Nandanaṭṭhena ^b^nandī^eb^. Tattha sukhumā apekkhā vuttā. Yā nikantīti vuccati.

[03]^b^Evaṃ sante^eb^ti evaṃ yathārutavaseneva imassa suttapadassa atthe gahetabbe sati. ^b^Samathavipassanāsu chandarāgo kattabbo^eb^ti anāgāmiphalaṃ anibbattetvā tadatthāya samathavipassanāpi anibbattetvā kevalaṃ tattha chandarāgo kattabbo bhavissati. Kasmā? Tesu samathavipassanāsaṅkhātesu dhammesu chandarāgamattena anāgāminā laddhabbassa aladdhaanāgāmiphalenapi laddhabbattā. Tathā sati tena anāgāmiphalampi laddhabbameva hoti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘anāgāmiphalaṃ paṭiladdhaṃ bhavissatī’’^eb^ti. Sabhāvato rasitabbattā aviparīto attho eva ^b^attharaso^eb^.
[03]^b^Aññāpi kāci sugatiyo^eb^ti vinipātike sandhāyāha. ^b^Aññāpi kāci duggatiyo^eb^ti asurakāyamāha.

[03]Appaṃ yācitena bahuṃ dentena uḷārapurisena viya ekaṃ dhammaṃ pucchitena ‘‘ayampi ekadhammo’’ti kathitattā ekādasapi dhammā pucchāvasena ekadhammo nāma jāto paccekaṃ vākyaparisamāpanañāyena. ^b^Pucchāvasenā^eb^ti ‘‘atthi nu kho, bhante ānanda, tena…pe… sammāsambuddhena ekadhammo sammadakkhāto’’ti evaṃ ^a^M3.0363^ea^ pavattapucchāvasena. ^b^Amatuppattiatthenā^eb^ti amatabhāvassa uppattihetutāya, sabbānipi kammaṭṭhānāni ekarasāpi amatādhigamassa paṭipattiyāti ^a^V3.0339^ea^ attho. Evamettha aggaphalabhūmi anāgāmiphalabhūmīti dveva bhūmiyo sarūpato āgatā, nānantariyatāya pana heṭṭhimāpi dve bhūmiyo atthato āgatā evāti daṭṭhabbāti. Pañca satāni aggho etassāti ^b^pañcasataṃ^eb^. Sesamettha uttānameva.
[06]Aṭṭhakanāgarasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.

[03]^b^17^eb^^b^.^eb^ Sattame ^b^tisso kathā^eb^ti tisso aṭṭhakathā, tividhā suttassa atthavaṇṇanāti attho. Ekekaṃ padaṃ nāḷaṃ mūlaṃ etissāti evaṃsaññitā ^b^ekanāḷikā^eb^. Ekekaṃ vā padaṃ nāḷaṃ atthaniggamanamaggo etissāti ^b^ekanāḷikā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘ekekassa padassa atthakathana’’^eb^nti. Cattāro aṃsā bhāgā atthasallakkhaṇūpāyā etissāti ^b^caturassā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘catukkaṃ bandhitvā kathana’’^eb^nti. Niyamato nisinnassa āraddhassa vatto saṃvatto etissā atthīti ^b^nisinnavattikā,^eb^ yathāraddhassa atthassa visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpikāti attho. Tenāha ^b^‘‘paṇḍitagopālakaṃ dassetvā’’^eb^tiādi. Ekekassapi padassa piṇḍatthadassanavasena bahūnaṃ padānaṃ ekajjhaṃ atthaṃ akathetvā ekamekassa padassa atthavaṇṇanā ayaṃ sabbattha labbhati. ^b^Catukkaṃ bandhitvā^eb^ti kaṇhapakkhe upamopameyyadvayaṃ, tathā sukkapakkheti idaṃ catukkaṃ yojetvā. Ayaṃ edisesu eva suttesu labbhati. ^b^Pariyosānagamana^eb^nti keci tāva āhu ‘‘kaṇhapakkhe upamaṃ dassetvā upamā ca nāma yāvadeva upameyyasampaṭipādanatthāti upameyyatthaṃ āharitvā saṃkilesapakkhaniddeso ca vodānapakkhavibhāvanatthāyāti sukkapakkhampi upamopameyyavibhāgena āharitvā suttatthassa pariyosāpanaṃ. Kaṇhapakkhe upameyyaṃ dassetvā pariyosānagamanādīsupi eseva nayo’’ti. Apare pana ‘‘kaṇhapakkhe, sukkapakkhe ca taṃtaṃupamūpameyyatthānaṃ visuṃ visuṃ pariyosāpetvāva kathanaṃ pariyosānagamana’’nti vadanti. ^b^Aya^eb^nti nisinnavattikā. ^b^Idhā^eb^ti imasmiṃ gopālakasutte. ^b^Sabbācariyānaṃ āciṇṇā^eb^ti sabbehipi pubbācariyehi ācaritā saṃvaṇṇitā, tathā ceva pāḷi pavattāti.

[03]Aṅgīyanti ^a^M3.0364^ea^ avayavabhāvena ñāyantīti ^b^aṅgāni,^eb^ koṭṭhāsā. Tāni panettha yasmā sāvajjasabhāvāni, tasmā āha ^b^‘‘aṅgehīti aguṇakoṭṭhāsehī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Gomaṇḍala^eb^nti gosamūhaṃ. ^b^Pariharitu^eb^nti rakkhituṃ. Taṃ pana pariharaṇaṃ pariggahetvā vicaraṇanti āha ^b^‘‘pariggahetvā vicaritu’’^eb^nti. ^b^Vaḍḍhi^eb^nti gunnaṃ bahubhāvaṃ bahugorasatāsaṅkhātaṃ parivuddhiṃ. ‘‘Ettakamida’’nti rūpīyatīti ^a^V3.0340^ea^^b^rūpaṃ,^eb^ parimāṇaparicchedopi sarīrarūpampīti āha ^b^‘‘gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā’’^eb^ti. ^b^Na pariyesati^eb^ vinaṭṭhabhāvasseva ajānanato. ^b^Nīlā^eb^ti ettha ^b^iti^eb^-saddo ādiattho. Tena setasabalādivaṇṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.

[03]^b^Dhanusattisūlādī^eb^ti ettha issāsācariyānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ ^b^dhanulakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Kumārabhattigaṇānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ ^b^sattilakkhaṇaṃ^eb^. Issarabhattigaṇānaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ ^b^sūlalakkhaṇa^eb^nti yojanā. ^b^Ādi^eb^-saddena rāmavāsudevagaṇādīnaṃ gāvīsu kataṃ pharasucakkādilakkhaṇaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
[03]^b^Nīlamakkhikā^eb^ti piṅgalamakkhikā, khuddakamakkhikā eva vā. Saṭati rujati etāyāti sāṭikā, saṃvaḍḍhā sāṭikā ^b^āsāṭikā^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘vaḍḍhantī’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Hāretā^eb^ti apanetā.

[03]^b^Vākenā^eb^ti vākapaṭṭena. ^b^Cīrakenā^eb^ti pilotikena. ^b^Antovasse^eb^ti vassakālassa abbhantare. ^b^Niggāha^eb^nti susumārādiggāharahitaṃ. ^b^Pīta^eb^nti pānīyassa pītabhāvaṃ. Sīhabyagghādiparissayena ^b^sāsaṅko sappaṭibhayo^eb^.
[03]Pañca ahāni ekassāti pañcāhiko, so eva vāroti, ^b^pañcāhikavāro^eb^. Evaṃ ^b^sattāhikavāro^eb^pi veditabbo. ^b^Ciṇṇaṭṭhāna^eb^nti caritaṭṭhānaṃ gocaraggahitaṭṭhānaṃ.

[03]^b^Pitiṭṭhāna^eb^nti pitarā kātabbaṭṭhānaṃ, pitarā kātabbakiccanti attho. ^b^Yathāruciṃ gahetvā gacchantī^eb^ti gunnaṃ rucianurūpaṃ gocarabhūmiṃ vā nadipāraṃ vā gahetvā gacchanti. ^b^Gobhatta^eb^nti kappāsaṭṭhikādimissaṃ gobhuñjitabbaṃ bhattaṃ. Bhattaggahaṇeneva yāgupi saṅgahitā.

[03]^b^Dvīhākārehī^eb^ti vuttaṃ ākāradvayaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘gaṇanato vā samuṭṭhānato vā’’^eb^ti vuttaṃ. ^b^Evaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatā^eb^ti ‘‘upacayo santatī’’ti jātiṃ dvidhā bhinditvā hadayavatthuṃ aggahetvā dasāyatanāni pañcadasa ^a^M3.0365^ea^ sukhumarūpānīti evaṃ ^b^rūpakaṇḍapāḷiyaṃ^eb^ (dha. sa. 666) āgatā. ^b^Pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsā^eb^ti salakkhaṇato aññamaññasaṅkarābhāvato rūpabhāgā. ^b^Rūpakoṭṭhāsā^eb^ti vā visuṃ visuṃ appavattitvā kalāpabhāveneva pavattanato rūpakalāpā. ^b^Koṭṭhāsā^eb^ti ca aṃsā avayavāti attho. ^b^Koṭṭha^eb^nti vā sarīraṃ, tassa aṃsā kesādayo koṭṭhāsāti aññepi avayavā koṭṭhāsā viya ^b^koṭṭhāsā.^eb^

[03]^b^Seyyathāpī^eb^tiādi ^a^V3.0341^ea^ upamāsaṃsandanaṃ. Tattha ^b^rūpaṃ pariggahetvā^eb^ti yathāvuttaṃ rūpaṃ salakkhaṇato ñāṇena pariggaṇhitvā. ^b^Arūpaṃ vavatthapetvā^eb^ti taṃ rūpaṃ nissāya ārammaṇañca katvā pavattamāne vedanādike cattāro khandhe arūpanti vavatthapetvā. ^b^Rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā^eb^ti puna tattha yaṃ rūppanalakkhaṇaṃ, taṃ rūpaṃ. Tadaññaṃ arūpaṃ. Ubhayavinimuttaṃ kiñci natthi attā vā attaniyaṃ vāti evaṃ rūpārūpaṃ pariggahetvā. Tadubhayañca avijjādinā paccayena sapaccayanti ^b^paccayaṃ sallakkhetvā,^eb^ aniccatādilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvā yo kalāpasammasanādikkamena kammaṭṭhānaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetuṃ na sakkoti, so na vaḍḍhatīti yojanā.

[03]^b^Ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhāna^eb^nti cakkhāyatanaṃ, sotāyatanaṃ, ghānāyatanaṃ, jivhāyatanaṃ, kāyāyatanaṃ, itthindriyaṃ, purisindriyaṃ, jīvitindriyanti aṭṭhavidhaṃ kammavasena; kāyaviññatti, vacīviññattīti idaṃ dvayaṃ cittavasenāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ekasamuṭṭhānaṃ. Saddāyatanamekaṃ utucittavasena ^b^dvisamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Rūpassa lahutā, mudutā, kammaññatāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhāravasena ^b^tisamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Rūpāyatanaṃ, gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṃ, ākāsadhātu, āpodhātu, kabaḷīkāro āhāroti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ utucittāhārakammavasena ^b^catusamuṭṭhānaṃ^eb^. Upacayo, santati, jaratā, rūpassa aniccatāti ettakaṃ rūpaṃ ^b^na kutoci samuṭṭhātīti na jānāti. Samuṭṭhānato rūpaṃ ajānanto^eb^tiādīsu vattabbaṃ ‘‘gaṇanato rūpaṃ ajānanto’’tiādīsu vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.

[03]^b^Kammalakkhaṇo^eb^ti attanā kataṃ duccaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, bālo. Vuttañhetaṃ – ‘‘tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, bālassa bālalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Duccintitacintī hoti, dubbhāsitabhāsī, dukkaṭakammakārī ^a^M3.0366^ea^. Imāni kho…pe… lakkhaṇānī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.246; a. ni. 3.3). Attanā kataṃ sucaritakammaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ etassāti kammalakkhaṇo, paṇḍito. Vuttampi cetaṃ ‘‘tīṇimāni, bhikkhave, paṇḍitassa paṇḍitalakkhaṇāni. Katamāni tīṇi? Sucintitacintī hoti, subhāsitabhāsī, sukatakammakārī. Imāni kho…pe… paṇḍitalakkhaṇānī’’ti (ma. ni. 3.253; a. ni. 3.3). Tenāha ^b^‘‘kusalākusalakammaṃ paṇḍitabālalakkhaṇa’’^eb^nti.

[03]^b^Bāle vajjetvā paṇḍite na sevatī^eb^ti yaṃ bālapuggale vajjetvā paṇḍitasevanaṃ atthakāmena kātabbaṃ, taṃ na karoti. Tathābhūtassa ca ayamādīnavoti dassetuṃ puna ^b^‘‘bāle vajjetvā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha yaṃ bhagavatā ‘‘idaṃ vo kappatī’’ti anuññātaṃ, tadanulomañce, taṃ ^a^V3.0342^ea^^b^kappiyaṃ^eb^. Yaṃ ‘‘idaṃ vo na kappatī’’ti paṭikkhittaṃ, tadanulomañce, taṃ ^b^akappiyaṃ^eb^. Yaṃ kosallasambhūtaṃ, taṃ ^b^kusalaṃ,^eb^ tappaṭipakkhaṃ ^b^akusalaṃ^eb^. Tadeva ^b^sāvajjaṃ,^eb^ kusalaṃ ^b^anavajjaṃ^eb^. Āpattito ādito dve āpattikkhandhā ^b^garukaṃ,^eb^ tadaññaṃ ^b^lahukaṃ^eb^. Dhammato mahāsāvajjaṃ ^b^garukaṃ,^eb^ appasāvajjaṃ ^b^lahukaṃ^eb^. Sappaṭikāraṃ ^b^satekicchaṃ,^eb^ appaṭikāraṃ ^b^atekicchaṃ^eb^. Dhammatānugataṃ ^b^kāraṇaṃ,^eb^ itaraṃ ^b^akāraṇaṃ. Taṃ ajānanto^eb^ti kappiyākappiyaṃ, garuka-lahukaṃ, satekicchātekicchaṃ ajānanto suvisuddhaṃ katvā sīlaṃ rakkhituṃ na sakkoti. Kusalākusalaṃ, sāvajjānavajjaṃ, kāraṇākāraṇaṃ ajānanto khandhādīsu akusalatāya rūpārūpapariggahampi kātuṃ na sakkoti, kuto tassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhanā. Tenāha ^b^‘‘kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vaḍḍhetuṃ na sakkotī’’^eb^ti.
[03]Govaṇasadise attabhāve uppajjitvā tattha dukkhuppattihetuto micchāvitakkā āsāṭikā viyāti ^b^āsāṭikā^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘akusalavitakkaṃ āsāṭikaṃ ahāretvā’’^eb^ti.

[03]‘‘Gaṇḍoti kho, bhikkhave, pañcannetaṃ upādānakkhandhānaṃ adhivacana’’nti (saṃ. ni. 4.103; a. ni. 8.56; 9.15) vacanato chahi vaṇamukhehi vissandamānayūso gaṇḍo viya pilotikākhaṇḍena chadvārehi vissandamānakilesāsuci attabhāvavaṇo satisaṃvarena pidahitabbo, ayaṃ pana evaṃ na karotīti āha ^b^‘‘yathā so gopālako vaṇaṃ na paṭicchādeti, evaṃ saṃvaraṃ na sampādetī’’^eb^ti.

[03]Yathā ^a^M3.0367^ea^ dhūmo indhanaṃ nissāya uppajjamāno saṇho sukhumo, taṃ taṃ vivaraṃ anupavissa byāpento sattānaṃ ḍaṃsamakasādiparissayaṃ vinodeti, aggijālāsamuṭṭhānassa pubbaṅgamo hoti, evaṃ dhammadesanāñāṇassa indhanabhūtaṃ rūpārūpadhammajātaṃ nissāya uppajjamānā saṇhā sukhumā taṃ taṃ khandhantaraṃ āyatanantarañca anupavissa byāpeti, sattānaṃ micchāvitakkādiparissayaṃ vinodeti, ñāṇaggijālāsamuṭṭhāpanassa pubbaṅgamo hoti, tasmā dhūmo viyāti ^b^dhūmo^eb^ti āha ^b^‘‘gopālako dhūmaṃ viya dhammadesanādhūmaṃ na karotī’’^eb^ti. Attano santikaṃ upagantvā nisinnassa kātabbā tadanucchavikā dhammakathā ^b^upanisinnakakathā^eb^. Katassa dānādipuññassa anumodanakathā ^b^anumodanā. Tato^eb^ti dhammakathādīnaṃ akaraṇato. ^b^‘‘Bahussuto guṇavāti na jānantī’’^eb^ti kasmā vuttaṃ? Nanu attano jānāpanatthaṃ dhammakathādi na kātabbamevāti? Saccaṃ na kātabbameva, suddhāsayena pana dhamme kathite tassa guṇajānanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tenāha bhagavā –
[21]‘‘Nābhāsamānaṃ ^a^V3.0343^ea^ jānanti, missaṃ bālehi paṇḍitaṃ;
[22]Bhāsaye jotaye dhammaṃ, paggaṇhe isinaṃ dhaja’’nti.

[03]Taranti otaranti etthāti ^b^titthaṃ,^eb^ naditaḷākādīnaṃ nahānapānādiatthaṃ otaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ. Yathā pana taṃ udakena otiṇṇasattānaṃ sarīramalaṃ pavāheti, parissamaṃ vinodeti, visuddhiṃ uppādeti, evaṃ bahussutā attano samīpaṃ otiṇṇasattānaṃ dhammodakena cittamalaṃ pavāhenti, parissamaṃ vinodenti, visuddhiṃ uppādenti, tasmā te titthaṃ viyāti ^b^titthaṃ^eb^. Tenāha ^b^‘‘titthabhūte bahussutabhikkhū’’^eb^ti. ^b^Byañjanaṃ kathaṃ ropetabba^eb^nti, bhante, idaṃ byañjanaṃ ayaṃ saddo kathaṃ imasmiṃ atthe ropetabbo, kena pakārena imassa atthassa vācako jāto. ‘‘Nirūpetabba’’nti vā pāṭho, nirūpetabbaṃ ayaṃ sabhāvanirutti kathamettha nirūḷhāti adhippāyo. ^b^Imassa bhāsitassa ko attho^eb^ti saddatthaṃ pucchati. ^b^Imasmiṃ ṭhāne^eb^ti imasmiṃ pāḷippadese. ^b^Pāḷi kiṃ vadatī^eb^ti bhāvatthaṃ pucchati. ^b^Attho kiṃ dīpetī^eb^ti bhāvatthaṃ vā? Saṅketatthaṃ vā. ^b^Na paripucchatī^eb^ti vimaticchedanapucchāvasena sabbaso pucchaṃ na karoti. ^b^Na paripañhatī^eb^ti pari pari attano ñātuṃ icchaṃ na ācikkhati, na vibhāveti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘na jānāpetī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Te^eb^ti bahussutabhikkhū. Vivaraṇaṃ nāma atthassa vibhajitvā ^a^M3.0368^ea^ kathananti āha ^b^‘‘bhājetvā na desentī’’^eb^ti. ^b^Anuttānīkata^eb^nti ñāṇena apākaṭīkataṃ guyhaṃ paṭicchannaṃ. ^b^Na uttāniṃ karontī^eb^ti sinerupādamūle vālikaṃ uddharanto viya pathavīsandhārodakaṃ vivaritvā dassento viya ca uttānaṃ na karonti.

[03]Evaṃ yassa dhammassa vasena bahussutā ‘‘tittha’’nti vuttā pariyāyato. Idāni tameva dhammaṃ nippariyāyato ‘‘tittha’’nti dassetuṃ ^b^‘‘yathā vā’’^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. Dhammo hi taranti otaranti etena nibbānaṃ nāma taḷākanti ‘‘tittha’’nti vuccati. Tenāha bhagavā sumedhabhūto –
[21]‘‘Evaṃ kilesamaladhovaṃ, vijjante amatantaḷe;
[22]Na gavesati taṃ taḷākaṃ, na doso amatantaḷe’’ti. (bu. vaṃ. 2.14) –
[07]Dhammasseva nibbānassotaraṇatitthabhūtassa otaraṇākāraṃ ajānanto ^b^‘‘dhammatitthaṃ na jānātī’’^eb^ti vutto.

[03]^b^Pītāpīta^eb^nti ^a^V3.0344^ea^ gogaṇe pītaṃ apītañca gorūpaṃ na jānāti, na vindati. Avindanto hi ^b^‘‘na labhatī’’^eb^ti vutto. ^b^‘‘Ānisaṃsaṃ na vindatī’’^eb^ti vatvā tassa avindanākāraṃ dassento ^b^‘‘dhammassavanaggaṃ gantvā’’^eb^tiādimāha.

[03]^b^Ayaṃ lokuttaro^eb^ti padaṃ sandhāyāha ^b^‘‘ariya’’^eb^nti. Paccāsattiñāyena anantarassa hi vippaṭisedho vā. Ariyasaddo vā niddosapariyāyo daṭṭhabbo. ^b^Aṭṭhaṅgika^eb^nti ca visuṃ ekajjhañca aṭṭhaṅgikaṃ upādāya gahetabbaṃ, aṭṭhaṅgatā bāhullato ca. Evañca katvā sattaṅgassapi ariyamaggassa saṅgaho siddho hoti.

[03]^b^Cattāro satipaṭṭhāne^eb^tiādīsu avisesena satipaṭṭhānā vuttā. Tattha kāyavedanācittadhammārammaṇā satipaṭṭhānā lokiyā, tattha sammohaviddhaṃsanavasena pavattā nibbānārammaṇā lokuttarāti evaṃ ^b^‘‘ime lokiyā, ime lokuttarā’’ti yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti^eb^.

[03]^b^Anavasesaṃ duhatī^eb^ti paṭiggahaṇe mattaṃ ajānanto kismiñci dāyake saddhāhāniyā, kismiñci paccayahāniyā anavasesaṃ duhati. Vācāya abhihāro ^b^vācābhihāro^eb^. Paccayānaṃ abhihāro ^b^paccayābhihāro^eb^.

[03]^b^‘‘Ime^eb^^a^M3.0369^ea^^b^amhesu garucittīkāraṃ na karontī’’^eb^ti iminā navakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sammāpaṭipattiyā abhāvaṃ dasseti ācariyupajjhāyesu pitupemassa anupaṭṭhāpanato, tena ca sikkhāgāravatābhāvadīpanena saṅgahassa abhājanabhāvaṃ, tena therānaṃ tesu anuggahābhāvaṃ. Na hi sīlādiguṇehi sāsane thirabhāvappattā ananuggahetabbe sabrahmacārī anuggaṇhanti, niratthakaṃ vā anuggahaṃ karonti. Tenāha ^b^‘‘navake bhikkhū’’^eb^tiādi. ^b^Dhammakathābandha^eb^nti paveṇiāgataṃ pakiṇṇakadhammakathāmaggaṃ. Saccasattappaṭisandhipaccayākārappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ suññatādīpanaṃ ^b^guḷhaganthaṃ. Vuttavipallāsavasenā^eb^ti ‘‘na rūpaññū’’tiādīsu vuttassa paṭisedhassa paṭikkhepavasena aggahaṇavasena. ^b^Yojetvā^eb^ti ‘‘rūpaññū hotīti gaṇanato vā vaṇṇato vā rūpaṃ jānātī’’tiādinā, ‘‘tassa gogaṇopi na parihāyati, pañcagorasaparibhogatopi na paribāhiro hotī’’tiādinā ca atthaṃ yojetvā. ^b^Veditabbo^eb^ti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ pade yathārahaṃ attho veditabbo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06]Gopālasuttavaṇṇanā niṭṭhitā.
[06]Iti ^a^V3.0345^ea^ manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttaranikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Ekādasakanipātavaṇṇanāya anuttānatthadīpanā samattā.
[06]Niṭṭhitā ca manorathapūraṇiyā aṅguttaranikāya-aṭṭhakathāya
[06]Anuttānatthapadavaṇṇanā.

[03]^b^Mahāaṭṭhakathāya^eb^^a^M3.0370^ea^^b^sāra^eb^nti aṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya sāraṃ. ^b^Ekūnasaṭṭhimatto^eb^ti thokaṃ ūnabhāvato mattasaddaggahaṇaṃ. ^b^Mūlaṭṭhakathāsāra^eb^nti pubbe vuttaaṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya sārameva anunigamavasena vadati. Atha vā ^b^mūlaṭṭhakathāsāra^eb^nti porāṇaṭṭhakathāsu atthasāraṃ. Tenedaṃ dasseti – aṅguttaramahāaṭṭhakathāya atthasāraṃ ādāya imaṃ manorathapūraṇiṃ karonto sesamahānikāyānampi mūlaṭṭhakathāsu idha viniyogakkhamaṃ atthasāraṃ ādāya evamakāsinti. ^b^Mahāvihārādhivāsīna^eb^nti ca idaṃ purimapacchimapadehi saddhiṃ sambandhitabbaṃ ‘‘mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ samayaṃ pakāsayantī, mahāvihārādhivāsīnaṃ mūlaṭṭhakathāsāraṃ ādāyā’’ti. ^b^Tenā^eb^ti puññena. ^b^Hotu sabbo sukhī loko^eb^ti kāmāvacarādivibhāgo sabbo sattaloko yathārahaṃ bodhittayādhigamavasena sampattena nibbānasukhena sukhī sukhito hotūti sadevakassa lokassa accantaṃ sukhādhigamāya attano puññaṃ pariṇāmeti.
[21]Ettāvatā samattāva, sabbaso vaṇṇanā ayaṃ;
[22]Vīsatiyā sahassehi, ganthehi parimāṇato.
[21]Porāṇānaṃ kathāmagga-sāramettha yato ṭhitaṃ;
[22]Tasmā ^b^sāratthamañjūsā,^eb^ iti nāmena vissutā.
[21]Ajjhesito narindena, sohaṃ ^b^parakkamabāhunā^eb^;
[22]Saddhammaṭṭhitikāmena, sāsanujjotakārinā.
[21]Teneva kārite ramme, pāsādasatamaṇḍite;
[22]Nānādumagaṇākiṇṇe, bhāvanābhiratālaye.
[21]Sītalūdakasampanne ^a^V3.0346^ea^, vasaṃ ^b^jetavane^eb^ imaṃ;
[22]Atthabyañjanasampannaṃ, akāsiṃ sādhusammataṃ.
[21]Yaṃ siddhaṃ iminā puññaṃ, yaṃ caññaṃ pasutaṃ mayā;
[22]Etena puññakammena, dutiye attasambhave.
[21]Tāvatiṃse pamodento, sīlācāraguṇe rato;
[22]Alaggo pañcakāmesu, patvāna paṭhamaṃ phalaṃ.
[21]Antime ^a^M3.0371^ea^ attabhāvamhi, metteyyaṃ munipuṅgavaṃ;
[22]Lokaggapuggalaṃ nāthaṃ, sabbasattahite rataṃ.
[21]Disvāna tassa dhīrassa, sutvā saddhammadesanaṃ;
[22]Adhigantvā phalaṃ aggaṃ, sobheyyaṃ jinasāsanaṃ.
[21]Sadā rakkhantu rājāno, dhammeneva imaṃ pajaṃ;
[22]Niratā puññakammesu, jotentu jinasāsanaṃ.
[21]Ime ca pāṇino sabbe, sabbadā nirupaddavā;
[22]Niccaṃ kalyāṇasaṅkappā, pappontu amataṃ padanti.
[06]Aṅguttaraṭīkā samattā.
